~Might Workout~.Effect: Working out in your spare time has paid off, and your Might increases by 1 (up to +3).
~Might Workout~.Notes: Remember to increase your Maximum Health by +1, as your Maximum Health benefits from Might.
~Might Workout~.Name: ~Might Workout~

~Dexterity Training~.Effect: Training your balance and reflexes improved your agility, and your Dexterity increases by 1 (up to +3).
~Dexterity Training~.Notes: Remember to increase your Initiative by +1, as your Dexterity is added to your Initiative. Also, your Defense might increase, depending on the armor you are wearing.
~Dexterity Training~.Name: ~Dexterity Training~

~Intelligence Study~.Effect: Studying in your free time has made you significantly smarter, and your Intelligence increases by 1 (up to +3).
~Intelligence Study~.Notes: This might increase your number of known spells or give you extra languages, depending on your Race or Class.
~Intelligence Study~.Name: ~Intelligence Study~

~Wisdom Meditation~.Effect: The habit of meditation has improved your senses and willpower, and your Wisdom increases by 1 (up to +3).
~Wisdom Meditation~.Name: ~Wisdom Meditation~

~Charisma On Command~.Effect: General attention to your body language and voice practicing in a mirror has improved your social sense, and your Charisma increases by 1 (up to +3).
~Charisma On Command~.Notes: Remember to increase your Initiative by +1, as your Charisma is added to your Initiative.
~Charisma On Command~.Name: ~Charisma On Command~

~Proficiency Training~.Effect:
Choose and gain Proficiency in any type of activity (see Proficiencies).
You can get this Feat multiple times (for different Proficiencies, obviously).
~Proficiency Training~.Name: ~Proficiency Training~

~Weapon Training~.Effect:
You become Trained in any of the following weapon categories (choose one):
- 1-Handed Melee Weapons
- 2-Handed Melee Weapons
- 1-Handed Ranged Weapons
- 2-Handed Ranged Weapons
- Thrown Weapons
- Shields
You can get this Feat multiple times.
~Weapon Training~.Name: ~Weapon Training~

~Element Apprentice~.Effect: When rolling damage for Acid, Fire, Cold or Shock, any 1's rolled count as 2.
~Element Apprentice~.Name: ~Element Apprentice~

~Groundholder~.Effect: You are immune to being Pushed and you gain +1 on Might Combat Checks.
~Groundholder~.Name: ~Groundholder~

~Heavyweight~.Effect: Heavy armor and regular shields don't slow you down. Tower shields only slow you by 1 meter.
~Heavyweight~.Name: ~Heavyweight~

~Magic Initiate~.Effect: You permanently know 2 Spells from any Spell List that cost no Mana and have no Cooldown. These Spells can't be changed on Long Rests, so choose wisely.
~Magic Initiate~.Name: ~Magic Initiate~

~Point Blanking~.Effect: Your melee attacks with ranged weapons don't have a penalty for shooting in melee range and you are immune to Fleeing.
~Point Blanking~.Name: ~Point Blanking~

~Strongfoot~.Effect: You only use 1 meter of your Speed to get up from being Prone and you are immune to being Slowed. Daze doesn't slow you down.
~Strongfoot~.Name: ~Strongfoot~

~Darkvision~.Effect: Your eyes are well adapted to dark environments, and you can see up to 15 meters away in darkness, without discerning colors.
~Darkvision~.Name: ~Darkvision~

~Double Spelldown~.Effect: You can cast Generic Abilities that have a Long Rest Cooldown twice per Long Rest.
~Double Spelldown~.Notes:
Some Abilities start with the Long Rest Cooldown, but the Cooldown is improved at higher levels. These Abilities DO count for Double Spelldown.
Generic Abilties refer to Abilities from the Ability Lists (e.g. Elemental, Conjuration, Nature, etc).
~Double Spelldown~.Name: ~Double Spelldown~

~Get Up!~.Effect: A Fallen ally near you gets up with 1 Health.
~Get Up!~.Name: ~Get Up!~

~Double Greatweapon Fighting~.Requirement: Trained in 2-Handed melee weapons and at least 2 Might
~Double Greatweapon Fighting~.Effect:
You can dual wield 2-Handed melee weapons, one in each hand.
If you attack like this, each attack takes only Half-Action and does -6 Damage.
When dual wielding them, if any ability tells you to perform an attack with a 2-Handed and the ability costs 1 Action, it costs only Half-Action.
~Double Greatweapon Fighting~.Notes:
Alternatively, you can wield a Shield in one hand and a 2-Handed melee weapon in the other.
You need Training in Shields to do this.
~Double Greatweapon Fighting~.Name: ~Double Greatweapon Fighting~

~Highlander Technique~.Effect:
You can wield 1-Handed melee weapons with both hands.
If you do, your 2-Handed attacks with 1-Handed melee weapons take 1 Action and deal an extra +2d6 Damage.
~Highlander Technique~.Name: ~Highlander Technique~

~Tower Shield Training~.Requirement: Trained in Shields, at least 2 Might
~Tower Shield Training~.Effect:
You can wield a Tower Shield.
A Tower Shield gives you a +2 Defense bonus, but reduces your Movement Speed and Damage from all sources by 2.
~Tower Shield Training~.Notes: Check the Weapons list for the stats of a Tower Shield. Check the Shop to see the price of a Tower Shield.
~Tower Shield Training~.Name: ~Tower Shield Training~

~Shield Dual-Wielding~.Effect:
You can wield a Shield in each hand.
Attacks with a normal Shield now deal 1d10 + Might damage (and the Shield counts as a weapon) (remember to subtract -1 from each Shield).
Note that each Shield equipped still reduces your Damage and Movement by 1.
~Shield Dual-Wielding~.Upgrade: If you have Tower Shield Training, you can dual-wield Tower Shields (or a normal Shield and a Tower Shield). Each Shield/Tower Shield applies its downsides.
~Shield Dual-Wielding~.Name: ~Shield Dual-Wielding~

~Armor Training~.Effect:
You become Trained in an armor type one tier higher than yours.
You can get this Feat multiple times.
~Armor Training~.Notes: E.g. if you can currently only wear Light armor, you can now wear Medium armor. If you can currently wear Medium armor, you can now wear Heavy armor.
~Armor Training~.Name: ~Armor Training~

~Throwing Expert~.Effect: You can throw melee weapons with no penalty to the damage.
~Throwing Expert~.Notes:
Throwing weapons has a range of 4 meters. Normally, if you throw a weapon, it will do its normal damage with a -2 penalty.
Note that some weapons can't trigger their effect on thrown attacks (e.g. if it specifies that it has an effect on "melee attacks").
~Throwing Expert~.Name: ~Throwing Expert~

~Blindness~.Effect:
You are blind in your eyes, but can understand your surroundings using your other senses.
You fail all Checks for seeing (or related), but gain Proficiency in Hearing and Smelling.
You are immune to being Blinded and take only 50% Psychic Damage (after subtracting Defense).
~Blindness~.Name: ~Blindness~

~Deafness~.Effect:
You are deaf in your ears, but can read lips and sense the rest of your surroundings using your other senses.
You fail all Checks for hearing (or related), but gain Proficiency in Sight and Smelling.
You are immune to being Silenced and take only 50% Psychic Damage (after subtracting Defense).
~Deafness~.Name: ~Deafness~

~Bertle - Thick Fur~.Effect: You have 50% resistance to Cold damage and gain +1 to Might Combat Checks.
~Bertle - Thick Fur~.Name: ~Bertle - Thick Fur~

~Bertle - Gatherer Instincts~.Effect:
You now only take 50% Poison and Acid damage and you can eat meat.
You have +5 on identifying plants, fruits, mushrooms, vegetables, etc.
~Bertle - Gatherer Instincts~.Notes: You are now no longer weak to Poison.
~Bertle - Gatherer Instincts~.Name: ~Bertle - Gatherer Instincts~

~Bertle - Innate Dexterity~.Effect: Your Dexterity increases by 1 (up to +3) and your Dexterity Combat Checks increase by an extra +1.
~Bertle - Innate Dexterity~.Notes: Remember to increase your Initiative by +1, as your Dexterity is added to your Initiative. Also, your Defense might increase, depending on the armor you are wearing.
~Bertle - Innate Dexterity~.Name: ~Bertle - Innate Dexterity~

~Bertle - I Am Speed~.Effect: You can have Dexterity as your class's Main Stat, even if your class says otherwise.
~Bertle - I Am Speed~.Name: ~Bertle - I Am Speed~

~Davel - Stubbornness~.Effect: You gain +1 in Might and Wisdom Combat Checks, and your alignment Abilities and traits can't change anymore and stay the same as they are now, even if your real alignment changes.
~Davel - Stubbornness~.Notes: That means you keep your Racial Ability choice, food particularities, etc.
~Davel - Stubbornness~.Name: ~Davel - Stubbornness~

~Davel - Hellish Magic~.Effect:
You permanently know 2 Generic Abilities that deal Fire Damage from any Ability List.
You can change these Abilities on a Long Rest.
~Davel - Hellish Magic~.Name: ~Davel - Hellish Magic~

~Dragonborn - Second Skin~.Effect:
Choose one more color from Draconic Ancestry.
You also gain Dragonborn Resistance to that color's element.
You can freely change Dragon's Breath to that element.
~Dragonborn - Second Skin~.Name: ~Dragonborn - Second Skin~

~Dragonborn - Forceful Breath~.Effect: Dragon's Breath pushes Medium Units 2 meters away and, if a Unit failed the Check, knocks them Prone.
~Dragonborn - Forceful Breath~.Notes: Knocking prone works on Larger Units, but not pushing.
~Dragonborn - Forceful Breath~.Name: ~Dragonborn - Forceful Breath~

~Dwarf - Resilient Ancestry~.Effect:
Your Reserve Health Pool increases by 6.
When rerolling a Check with Dwarven Resilience, add +3 to the roll.
~Dwarf - Resilient Ancestry~.Name: ~Dwarf - Resilient Ancestry~

~Dwarf - Adapted Resting~.Effect:
You gain +3 maximum Health.
You now only need to sleep 8 hours per day and have +3 to Combat Checks that would put you to Sleep.
~Dwarf - Adapted Resting~.Name: ~Dwarf - Adapted Resting~

~Dwarf - Skill of Trade~.Effect:
Your Charisma increases by 1 (up to a maximum of +3).
You can get free shelter and food in inns and taverns (if you would normally be able to pay for them).
You gain an extra +5 to Intelligence rolls when checking stone walls, doors, statues, etc.
~Dwarf - Skill of Trade~.Name: ~Dwarf - Skill of Trade~

~Dwarf - Heavy Weapons~.Effect: You become Trained in 2-Handed Melee Weapons and gain +1 to Might Combat Checks.
~Dwarf - Heavy Weapons~.Name: ~Dwarf - Heavy Weapons~

~Elf - Mana Tap~.Effect: A Unit within 3 meters must pass an Intelligence Check or be Silenced.
~Elf - Mana Tap~.Name: ~Elf - Mana Tap~

~Elf - Natural Swiftness~.Effect: Gain +4 Movement this turn and you avoid Attacks of Oportunity.
~Elf - Natural Swiftness~.Name: ~Elf - Natural Swiftness~

~Elf - Landsperson~.Effect: Choose any land specialty ability from Coven of the Land Druid specialization and learn it permanently.
~Elf - Landsperson~.Notes: This can't be changed on a Long Rest, so choose wisely!
~Elf - Landsperson~.Name: ~Elf - Landsperson~

~Elf - Light Weapons~.Effect: You become Trained in 1-Handed Melee Weapons and you can have 1 extra Known Generic Ability from Spell Lists that costs no Mana and has no Cooldown (from what your class allows).
~Elf - Light Weapons~.Name: ~Elf - Light Weapons~

~Elf - Agile Technique~.Effect: You can use any weapon with your Dexterity Stat (instead of Might, in some cases).
~Elf - Agile Technique~.Name: ~Elf - Agile Technique~

~Gnome - Luckier~.Effect: You can use Lucky once more per Long Rest.
~Gnome - Luckier~.Name: ~Gnome - Luckier~

~Gnome - Environmentalist~.Effect:
You can move normally through Hard Terrain.
Permanently learn 2 Spells from the Nature Spell List that don't have a Cooldown or cost Mana.
~Gnome - Environmentalist~.Notes: These Spells are permanent and can't be changed on Long Rests, so choose wisely!
~Gnome - Environmentalist~.Name: ~Gnome - Environmentalist~

~Gnome - Little Handed~.Effect: You become Trained in 1-Handed Ranged Weapons and can move through spaces of enemy Units.
~Gnome - Little Handed~.Name: ~Gnome - Little Handed~

~Hollow - O.B.E.~.Effect:
Your soul temporarily exits your body, leaving your body motionless to the ground.
While outside your body, the soul can't do anything except perceive.
You can return to your body for 0 Actions.
While outside your body, you have +3 on Wisdom Checks.
If more than 10 minutes pass outside the body, your soul instantly re-enters the body.
~Hollow - O.B.E.~.Name: ~Hollow - O.B.E.~

~Hollow - Kindled~.Effect:
You are no longer vulnerable to Fire damage.
After every worthy combat encounter, if your health is below 25% and you are conscious, heal back to 25% Health.
~Hollow - Kindled~.Name: ~Hollow - Kindled~

~Hollow - Numb Revenge~.Effect:
Choose an enemy near you.
That enemy performs an attack on you.
If you survive the attack, you gain 1 Action which you can use to attack or cast spells on that enemy.
~Hollow - Numb Revenge~.Name: ~Hollow - Numb Revenge~

~Human - Target Practice~.Effect: You become Trained in any 2 weapon categories or 2 Proficiencies (or one of each).
~Human - Target Practice~.Name: ~Human - Target Practice~

~Human - Social Talent~.Effect: Your Charisma increases by +1 (up to +3), your Charisma Combat Checks by an extra +1 and you can understand the intent, tonality or general idea of written texts and spoken phrases in any language you don't speak.
~Human - Social Talent~.Name: ~Human - Social Talent~

~Human - Magic Diversity~.Effect: Pick either Arcane, Eldritch or Divine, and you can also Know Abilities from that Ability List, on top of the ones your Class allows you to know.
~Human - Magic Diversity~.Name: ~Human - Magic Diversity~

~Human - Ignorance Bliss~.Effect: Your Main Stat can't be less than 3, and you gain Proficiency in Luck.
~Human - Ignorance Bliss~.Name: ~Human - Ignorance Bliss~

~Orc - Savage Attacks~.Effect:
Use after you land an attack.
Roll and add one other damage die from the attacks' damage dice to the damage roll.
~Orc - Savage Attacks~.Name: ~Orc - Savage Attacks~

~Orc - Heavy Weapons~.Effect: You become Trained in 2-Handed Melee Weapons and gain +2 maximum Health.
~Orc - Heavy Weapons~.Name: ~Orc - Heavy Weapons~

~Orc - Bloodshed Wish~.Effect: You gain +1 Might or Dexterity, and you can Know Abilities from the Bloodshed Ability List, even if it's not normally available to your Class.
~Orc - Bloodshed Wish~.Name: ~Orc - Bloodshed Wish~

~Familiar - Check Warp~.Effect:
Whenever you (or the Familiar) force(s) a Unit roll a Combat Check, you can freely change which Stat is used for that roll.
Whenever you (or the Familiar) make(s) a Combat Check, you can freely swap the Stat to Intelligence.
~Familiar - Check Warp~.Name: ~Familiar - Check Warp~

~Familiar - Element Lash~.Effect:
The closest enemy (you choose if tie) to the familiar makes a Dexterity Check.
If it fails, it takes 4d4 + Main Stat damage (of your Familiar Element), or half of that if it succeeds.
~Familiar - Element Lash~.Name: ~Familiar - Element Lash~

~Familiar - Health Funnel~.Effect:
Deal 6 damage to your Familiar, and you gain 4 Health.
Or..
Deal 4 damage to yourself, and your Familiar gains 6 Health.
~Familiar - Health Funnel~.Name: ~Familiar - Health Funnel~

~Familiar - Meat Shield~.Effect:
Passively, your pet gains 7 extra maximum Health and its size becomes Large.
When you are attacked, before the attack roll, you can activate this to make your pet dash to your position and the attack will be redirected to your pet.
To dash, your pet must be within 6 meters of you.
~Familiar - Meat Shield~.Name: ~Familiar - Meat Shield~

~Familiar - Seduce~.Effect: A Unit must pass a Wisdom Check (against your Spell Grade) or be Charmed by the familiar.
~Familiar - Seduce~.Name: ~Familiar - Seduce~

~Familiar - Soul Attack~.Effect:
Your familiar attacks a Unit's soul and briefly disappears.
It appears back near you at the start of your next-next turn and deals 3d10 Dark damage (against Defense) but ignores half of the target's Defense.
~Familiar - Soul Attack~.Name: ~Familiar - Soul Attack~

~Familiar - Camouflage Master~.Effect: You and your familiar have +3 in Dexterity rolls for Stealth.
~Familiar - Camouflage Master~.Name: ~Familiar - Camouflage Master~

~Familiar - Chain Devour Magic~.Effect:
Cast one of these two effects:
1. Cure a crowd control, debuff, curse or poison on an ally.
2. A Unit must pass an Intelligence Check or be Silenced.
If the target fails, you may use Chain Devour Magic again this turn.
~Familiar - Chain Devour Magic~.Notes: This can happen again and again until a target passes or you use the cure effect.
~Familiar - Chain Devour Magic~.Name: ~Familiar - Chain Devour Magic~

~Familiar - Sentience~.Effect:
Your familiar can speak and communicate in all languages you know.
Your Counter Check Grade also increases by 1 and your Maximum Health by 3.
~Familiar - Sentience~.Name: ~Familiar - Sentience~
